"About Collection Files":
"[About Collection Files]

\"Collection File\" is a system that makes you
gather specific items to obtain rare weapons
or eggs from a list of rewards.

Talk to Pudding at the Quest Counter and
select a reward from \"Collection File\".

Use the main menu to check your progression
and the required items.

See the Online Manual below for more information
<&URL pso2_players_manual_equipment_collectfile>"
